short.ar: استخدم الإملاء للكتابة بأكثر من 10 آلاف موقع بأكثر من 50 لغة. يقوم VoiceIn بنسخ كلامك إلى نص في الوقت الفعلي.
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,gu,: Use dictation to type in 10k+ sites in 50+ languages. VoiceIn transcribes your speech to text in real time.
short.bg: Използвайте диктовка, за да пишете в 10k+ сайта на 50+ езика. VoiceIn транскрибира вашата реч в текст в реално време.
short.ca: Utilitzeu el dictat per escriure més de 10 mil llocs web en 50 idiomes.
short.cs: Pomocí diktátu zadejte více než 10 000 webů ve více než 50 jazycích. VoiceIn přepisuje vaši řeč na text v reálném čase.
short.da: Brug diktat til at skrive i 10k+ websteder på 50+ sprog. VoiceIn transskriberer din tale til tekst i realtid.
short.de: Verwenden Sie das Diktat, um auf über 10.000 Websites in 50 Sprachen zu tippen.
short.el: Χρησιμοποιήστε υπαγόρευση για να πληκτρολογήσετε πάνω από 10 χιλιάδες ιστότοπους σε 50 γλώσσες.
short.es: Use el dictado para escribir en más de 10 mil sitios web en 50 idiomas.
short.et: Kasutage dikteerimist, et tippida 10 000+ saidile 50+ keeles. VoiceIn transkribeerib teie kõne reaalajas tekstiks.
short.fi: Käytä sanelua kirjoittaaksesi yli 10 000 sivustoa yli 50 kielellä. VoiceIn litteroi puheesi tekstiksi reaaliajassa.
short.fil: Gumamit ng dictation para mag-type ng 10k+ site sa 50+ na wika. Itina-transcribe ng VoiceIn ang iyong pananalita sa real time.
short.fr: Utilisez la dictée pour saisir plus de 10 000 sites Web dans 50 langues.
short.he: השתמש בהכתבה כדי להקליד יותר מ-10 אלף אתרים ב-50+ שפות. VoiceIn מתמלל את הדיבור שלך לטקסט בזמן אמת.
short.hi: 50 भाषाओं में 10 हजार से अधिक वेबसाइटों में टाइप करने के लिए डिक्टेशन का उपयोग करें।
short.hu: A diktálás használatával több mint 10 ezer webhelyet írhat be 50 nyelven.
short.id: Gunakan dikte untuk mengetik 10k+ situs dalam 50+ bahasa. VoiceIn mentranskripsi ucapan Anda ke teks secara real time.
short.it: Usa la dettatura per digitare in oltre 10.000 siti in oltre 50 lingue. VoiceIn trascrive il tuo discorso in testo in tempo reale.
short.ja: ディクテーションを使用して、50 以上の言語で 10,000 以上のサイトに入力します。 VoiceIn は、音声をリアルタイムでテキストに書き起こします。
short.ko: 받아쓰기를 사용하여 50개 이상의 언어로 10,000개 이상의 사이트를 입력하세요. VoiceIn은 실시간으로 음성을 텍스트로 변환합니다.
short.lt: Naudokite diktantą, kad įvestumėte daugiau nei 10 tūkstančių svetainių 50 kalbų.
short.lv: Izmantojiet diktātu, lai rakstītu vairāk nekā 10 000 vietņu vairāk nekā 50 valodās. VoiceIn pārraksta jūsu runu tekstā reāllaikā.
short.ms: Gunakan imlak untuk menaip 10k+ tapak dalam 50+ bahasa. VoiceIn menyalin ucapan anda kepada teks dalam masa nyata.
short.nl: Gebruik dictaat om meer dan 10.000 sites in meer dan 50 talen te typen. VoiceIn transcribeert uw spraak in realtime naar tekst.
short.no: Bruk diktat til å skrive inn over 10 000 nettsteder på over 50 språk. VoiceIn transkriberer talen din til tekst i sanntid.
short.pl: Używaj dyktowania, aby pisać na ponad 10 tysiącach stron internetowych w 50 językach.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Use o ditado para digitar em mais de 10 mil sites em mais de 50 idiomas. O VoiceIn transcreve sua fala em texto em tempo real.
short.ro: Utilizați dictarea pentru a introduce peste 10 mii de site-uri web în 50 de limbi.
short.ru: Используйте диктовку для ввода более 10 тысяч веб-сайтов на 50 языках.
short.sk: Použite diktát na zadávanie viac ako 10 000 stránok vo viac ako 50 jazykoch. VoiceIn prepisuje vašu reč na text v reálnom čase.
short.sl: Z narekom vtipkajte več kot 10.000 spletnih mest v več kot 50 jezikih. VoiceIn prepiše vaš govor v besedilo v realnem času.
short.sr: Користите диктат да куцате више од 10.000 сајтова на 50+ језика. ВоицеИн транскрибује ваш говор у текст у реалном времену.
short.sv: Använd diktering för att skriva in 10k+ webbplatser på 50+ språk. VoiceIn transkriberar ditt tal till text i realtid.
short.th: ใช้การป้อนตามคำบอกเพื่อพิมพ์ไซต์กว่า 10,000 แห่งในภาษาต่างๆ กว่า 50 ภาษา VoiceIn ถอดเสียงคำพูดของคุณเป็นข้อความแบบเรียลไทม์
short.tr: 50 dilde 10 binden fazla web sitesinde yazmak için dikteyi kullanın.
short.uk: Використовуйте диктування, щоб вводити понад 10 тисяч веб-сайтів 50 мовами.
short.vi: Sử dụng đọc chính tả để nhập hơn 10.000 trang web bằng 50 ngôn ngữ.
short.zh_CN: 使用听写以 50 多种语言输入 10k+ 个网站。 VoiceIn 将您的语音实时转录为文本。
short.zh_TW: 使用聽寫以 50 多種語言輸入 10k+ 個網站。 VoiceIn 將您的語音實時轉錄為文本。

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fil,fr,he,:
With VoiceIn you can use speech recognition capabilities in ANY textbox on ANY website. VoiceIn uses Google's speech recognition engine, the most accurate Speech To Text technology available today to let you voice type into any website.

After initial installation - it's recommended to close and reopen the browser, so it can work smoothly on all opened tabs.

There are two ways to start dictation:
1) Simply place the mouse in the text-box, and then you can either right-click and choose Start-Recording from the popup menu, or, 
2) Simply click on the extension's button right to the address bar. VoiceIn works silently in the background and is always on. 

Default recognition language is English-US.
To switch language go to the app's options page on:
chrome-extension://pjnefijmagpdjfhhkpljicbbpicelgko/askforpermissions.html

First time - you'll need to give the extension microphone permissions.

** Note that the app is in Beta currently ** 

For dictating on Facebook, Stack Overflow, and some other specific websites, you might need to manually type in Space (using your keyboard) and only then start dictation. This is because these sites expects user's keyboard input.

Would love to hear your feedback! If a particular site does not work or you have feedback, email us at support@dictanote.co
Created with love by makers of Dictanote (https://dictanote.co).
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,gu,:
Voice In enables voice typing --- it makes it easy to type in the browser using voice-to-text. 
Whether it is writing emails in Gmail, answering assignments in Classroom, responding to customer tickets, replying to chats or learning pronunciations, Voice In Speech-To-Text capability lets you do them all using your voice.

For more information, visit https://dictanote.co/voicein/

WORKS WHERE YOU DO 
Voice In for Chrome allows you to use the power of speech recognition to type emails in Gmail or write blog posts on Wordpress or send messages in Slack. Voice In works in Gmail, Outlook,  web-based CRMs and EHRs, dating sites, Teladoc, and in any site that contains a text box. 

TRUSTED BY THOUSANDS OF USERS 
Voice In is trusted by 500K+ users across more than 50 countries who record over 5 million minutes every month. Students, journalists, salespeople, medical professionals, elders, and anyone who wants to work more effectively use Voice In daily. 

FREE TO USE 
Our Basic plan comes with everything you need to dictate for free. 

DICTATE IN 40+ LANGUAGES 
Voice In recognizes 40+ languages including Portuguese, Italiano, Deutsch, Français​. You can also use Voice In to practice your pronunciation in all these languages. 

VOICE IN IN THE NEWS 
"If you’ve ever been using a website and wished it had a voice input, now you can add one yourself." – LifeHacker 

SUPPORT
Would love to hear your feedback! If a particular site does not work or you have feedback, email us at support@dictanote.co
